content.title: Renal Artery Aneurysm
content.description: Localized dilatation of renal artery, most commonly at bifurcation, requiring intervention based on size and patient factors.

clinical_features.location: Most at main renal or first branch bifurcation

indications_for_treatment.pregnancy: Treatment recommended in women of childbearing age at any size

content.clinical_pearl: Pregnancy risk is overstated historically, but childbearing potential lowers treatment threshold
content.statement: Renal Artery Aneurysm is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Renal-Artery that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
